title: Whatsup doc?
column3: how can a rabbit even understand the immensity of such a question?

title: I thought I saw a puddy-tat
body: Did I seriously see a puddy-tat? I know I like the attention when I say I did I did see a puddy-tat.

title: Hello is there anybody out there
body: No sersiouly. I am physically blind and cannot see anything. I don't know if anybody is out there. nobody talks to me.

title: I love you
body: I love you so you MUST love me. We can be one big happy family. Forever. Eternal.
